query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_rows, 
       SUM(CAST(spend AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_spend,
       COUNT(DISTINCT campaign_name) as unique_campaigns
FROM ad_performance 
WHERE date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
